dt-option.name: language.loadingRecords
dt-option.summary: Loading information display string - shown when Ajax loading data
dt-option.description: When using Ajax sourced data and during the first draw when DataTables is gathering the data, this message is shown in an empty row in the table to indicate to the end user the data is being loaded. Note that this parameter is not used when loading data by server-side processing, just Ajax sourced data with client-side processing.
